title: 如何修改实体弓箭材质？
author: HaoH昊昊

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
HaoH昊昊 发表于 2016-7-24 20:51
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1i4ixPLr#path=%252FMC%25E5%25AD%2598%25E6%25A1%25A3%252F%25E5%259C%25B0%25E ...
呵呵，1.9真是深藏不露啊
真正箭的材质在\assets\minecraft\textures\entity\projectiles里面，修改里面的材质即可

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
.minecraft\version中有一个版本号.jar文件
更改\assets\minecraft\textures\entity中的arrow.png就行了
也可以用资源包的形式加载

Photoshop，paint.net等软件都可以
绘制教程 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-114839-1-1.html
